title: NEW TyPOGRaPHIC RELEASE
content:
My baby is about to born... we think will be in the end of June.   
   
Is name will be Gonçalo Giambattista Bodoni!   
   
Isn't that a typographic event? ![:)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020021509im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
Bye
author: rmatos
